name: Geopoly
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: GEOPOLY is a geolocation economic simulator that allows users to rent and buy, upgrade and sell real-life businesses all around the world. Available already on Android (with iOS and Web coming soon), it creates a fun and innovative on & off experience in 2 main interconnected gameplays. Explore, look for opportunities, rent, buy, invest and sell in the largest capitalist game in the world where the main goal is to generate as much revenue as possible and expand your business exponentially.
